title: Super 30
summary: Super 30 is based on the remarkable life story of India’s genius mathematician Anand Kumar who was born into a very poor family in the Indian state of Bihar. reviews.content: The premise was awesome. But so much drama dimmed the shining spark of this film. Although acting was powerful. Hrithik Roshan deserves some nominations. But Pankaj Tripathi was wasted here.
